DepthPriority: The depth priority used for while drawing data. Can be World or Foreground (with this one the shapes will be drawn on top of the geometry and be always visible)
LinearImpulseScale: Scale to apply to the Linear Impulse vector before draw it.
AngularImpulseScale: Scale to apply to the Angular Impulse vector before draw it.
GeneralScale: Scale to apply to anything that does not have a dedicated scale setting before draw it.
BaseLineThickness: Line thickness to use as a base to calculate the different line thickness values used to debug draw the data.
CenterOfMassSize: Size of the debug drawn Center Of Mass.
ConstraintAxisLength: Size of the debug drawn if the Constraint Axis
